xx.UI_CONTRACT_SAZERAC_DESC:
Good evening, 47
Your target is FATHER ADALRICO CANDELARIA, a catholic cardinal considered by Vatican insiders to be a strong contender as the next pope.
However, ICA files indicate a series of links between the Target and the Pinochet regime in Chile in the 70s and 80s.
The Target is currently on a tour of Europe, with a stopover at the church in Sapienza, where his itinerary states he will spend some time in prayer. He will be extremely well protected at all times by multiple layers of highly alert security.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_MAI_TAI_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
This one is a little different. Your target calls himself MR. GIGGLES and operates an underground circus called the Soirée Horrible. Attractions include animal fights, deadly blood-sports and other choreographed violence.
We are uncertain why he is in MARAKECH, only that he is somewhere in the city centre. You will need to locate him on the ground, and engage at your discretion.
He should be simple enough to spot, at least.
The client requires that in addition to eliminating the Target you also acquire his client list. Given the Target’s personality, he is unlikely to manage such matters himself, so you will need to discover its location on site.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_PISCO_SOUR_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is DYLAN NARVÁEZ, currently in Sapienza with his IDENTICAL TWIN BROTHER GONZALES.
The Narváez brothers are tobacco billionaires, and mainly operate in Mainland China. Note that Gonzales Narváez is not to be harmed, and the contract will be cancelled if he is injured in any manner. As they are identical twins you will have to choose your target with supreme care.
We have learned that the Target has recently purchased a one-of-a-kind PLATINUM MANGÔT WRISTWATCH, so if you can get close enough this will help you identify him.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BLUE_BLAZER_DESC:
Your target is Scott Sarno, director of European Operations for the CICADA private military corporation.
He is a thirty-year veteran of clandestine operations, and our files link him to a number of questionable operations in Europe and the Middle East as far back as the mid-nineties.
The client has indicated the Target to be highly trained and observant. You should expect him to be accompanied by several Cicada agents at all times.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_MIMOSA_DESC:
Good Afternoon 47.
I have the second profile online now.
Your Target is GARY LUNN, a high security operative at the ETHER CORPORATION. We have learned that he has arrived at the ETHER BIOLAB in the Italian town of Sapienza to supervise security there.
Although your target was part of the same CICADA paramilitary unit as SCOTT SARNO, there is no indication that the target has learned of his colleague’s death.
However, you should expect access to be restricted, and on-site security to be heavy.
I’ll leave you to prepare.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_GINFIZZ_DESC:
Good Afternoon 47.
I have the third profile uploaded. Your target is WALTER MENARD. Like both previous targets, he is a veteran of the paramilitary SIGMA UNIT, active during the Yugoslav War of the 90s.
My research has uncovered a series of disappearances and massacres in the area where SIGMA was operating, which may be related to the Contract.
Your Target has been tasked with handling the evacuation of rogue banker CLAUS HUGO STRANDBERG, and we believe he is currently attached as an advisor to GENERAL ZAYDAN in MARAKESH.
The city is on the brink of a military coup, so you should have cover to operate.
I’ll leave you to prepare.
xx.04643101: A small plastic bag with clear fine cut diamonds.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_OBJ_2_DESC:
The ICA has no information on the current location of Strandberg's diamonds..

However, the Target, Xander Haverfoek, often makes use of dead-drops and third parties when moving valuable and sensative merchandise. We expect him to meet a courier in the city center to hand over the location of the diamonds. This courier will then make the pickup from a third party, and transport the diamonds to a third location.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_OBJ_3_BRIEF: Get the diamonds from the courier.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_OBJ_2_BRIEF: Follow the courier until he retrieves the diamonds
xx.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is XANDER HAVERFOEK, attached at the Swedish Embassy in Marakech. We are expecting him to meet a courier in the city to hand off a consignment of diamonds on behalf of Claus Hugo Strandberg.
You must both retrieve the package and eliminate the Target.
We have been unable to obtain any information on where this package is located, so you will need to shadow either the Target or the courier to discover its location.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_OBJ_3_DESC: After the courier has made the pickup, we expect him to proceed to a secure third location, and await further instructions. Retrieve the diamonds from the courier by any means necessary, but ideally avoiding collatoral damage.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SCREWDRIVER_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is VITO ĐURIĆ, a highly successful arms dealer and sanctions buster. Although the subject of a global manhunt by law-enforcement agencies, the Target has successful evaded capture, or escaped prosecution by other means for more than a decade.
We believe he is in Marakech to finalise the sale of a considerable load of weapons to the mercenaries who helped bust Strandberg out of prison. Despite tight security, we believe this is the best opportunity to eliminate him before he vanishes again.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_KIRROYAL_DESC:
Your target is Nila Torvik a brilliant pharmaceuticals scientist and CEO of Torvik Research. Her company is a major provider of low-cost generic drugs to the developing world. We have learnt that she has been involved in a special project on behalf of IAGO, but have no specifics at this time.
She will be attending the IAGO Auction in Paris as a personal guest of Dhalia Magholis. Be aware that Torvik may have been been warned of a potential assassination attempt, so you should expect her to be highly suspicious.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_MARGARITA_DESC:
Your target is sir Howard Moxxon, an international antiquities trader. He is in Paris to facilitate the sale of the Ivory White, a World War Two treasure looted in the Siege of Berlin. We believe this is the third time that the target has sold the White, replacing the original with a forgery each time.
He is attending the party surrounding the Sanguine fashion show.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_MARGARITA_OBJ_2_DESC: The Ivory White is a fine filigree egg, of pre-revolutionary Russian providence. It's last known location was in the Novodonskoy Monastery, where it was being stored along-side other treasures of the tsarist era. When the monastery was captured during the Nazi German advance on Moscow the Ivory White vanished, and subsequently passed into private hands after the war, where it became something of a myth amongst art collectors. While it has never been in on public auction, similar items have fetched in excess of twenty million pounds.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_TEQUILA_SUNRISE_DESC:
Your target is Sergei Larin, an accomplished art forger and has been copying and the selling the museum’s crown jewels to finance his extravagant lifestyle. In reality, both museum and artwork are owned by his wife, Simone Larin, and have been in her family for generations.
While his wife is in New York with an excellent alibi, you have a window of opportunity to engage.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_WHITE_RUSSIAN_DESC:
Your target is Brandon Conner, an IT Billionaire who built his fortune on Dark Net identity theft, money laundering, and the sale of narcotics and weapons.
We do not have much information, but Intel indicates that he will be attending the IAGO auction, and has hired an escort to join him at the cocktail reception on the ground floor.
We can assume the target will be mobile, so you will have to locate him and improvise on site.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_DARK_AND_STORMY_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is documentary-maker PHLLIPOS KAPHANOPOLIS. He is investigating rumours that Dino Bosco was assassinated, and believes that the FILM STUDIO was responsible. The ICA has confirmed the leak was not on our end, and your work, as always, was impeccable.
You will be returning to Sapienza to eliminate the target before he draws more attention to the matter.
We believe he will be accompanied by his producer CRAIG BLACK, and a camera-man. Sapienza is hosting the annual festival, and we expect security to be higher than normal.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_MINT_JULEP_DESC:
Good morning 47.
Your target is CONGRESSMAN ANTHONY L. TROUTT, a veteran of the Invasion of Grenada in 1983. Reports linking him to a number of friendly-fire accidents were suppressed after the conflict, and never become public record.
He is staying with Silvio Caruso in Sapienza as a part of a meet and greet with European moneymen and power-brokers ahead of a possible presidential bid in 2024.
Expect additional security and at least one personal assistant to be close to the Target at all times.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_CAIPIRINHA_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is media personality Bartholemew Argus. The charismatic musician-turned-film-star is at the epicentre of a drugs and weapons investigation in the UK, and the subject of an Interpol arrest order. The target has gone underground, leaving his former business partner and infamous London Gangster, Tommy “Hammer” Spoakes to take the blame.
We have learned that the Target is lying low in Sapienza as a guest of Dino Bosco, and this represents an ideal window of opportunity to engage.
Intelligence indicates that the Target is overstaying his welcome, however, as Bosco’s monumental film production drags on.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BLOODYMARY_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is ADEZE OJOIFOR, also known under her war-name of NNA ỌBARA, or “Bloody Mamma”. She operates groups of militants and bandits across west Africa, and controls a sizeable chunk of the rare-earth trade out of that region. Following French interventions across the sub-continent she is looking to secure her legacy by connecting her son with RICHARD EKWENSI.
She is currently staying at the PRAYA COSMOPOLITANE** where her entourage has taken over an entire floor while she waits for Ekwensi to arrive.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_THELASTWORD_OBJ_1_TITLE: Steal the PDA with the unfinished manuscript
xx.UI_CONTRACT_TAMAGOZAKE_OBJ_1_DESC: The client requests that you eliminate Oybek Nabazov's three lieutenants, indicating that these three individuals are being primed for an imminent attack. They are massively indoctrinated, and will be close to the Target at all times. It should be easy enough to eliminate them, assuming collateral casualties can be avoided.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_THELASTWORD_OBJ_1_DESC: The client requests that you locate and retrieve the latest manuscript.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_THELASTWORD_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is CRAIG BLACK, the highly successful author of the Cassandra Snow young-adult novels.
While the novels, spin-off TV series and movie trilogies are reviled by reviewers, they have made the Target enormously wealthy.
The client is the ghostwriter of the original novels, and has been cheated out of fame and the financial success by the Target. She requests that you locate and retrieve the latest manuscript in addition to eliminating the Target, in order to prevent it being posthumously published.
We have learned that the Target will be reading sections of the latest manuscript in Sapienza tonight, which gives you a window to engage.
The New England Wiccan novels are hugely successful, so the reading is invitation only and expected to be packed. There is no accounting for taste.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SHANDY_DESC:
Your target is multi-platinum media sensation Johnathan Smythe. He is the subject of an international manhunt, following his involvement in a multiple homicide three years ago. He fled prosecution, but continues to release records, and maintains an extensive financial empire that has only been bolstered by the controversy.
We have learned that he will be hosting a private party somewhere in the Palace grounds. This is the first opportunity to engage in over three years, so we must act immediately. 
The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_MOJITO_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is KIERAN HUDSON, a controversial tabloid journalist. The client is a former victim of the Target’s baseless smear articles, and wants the journalist eliminated in retaliation for a particularly destructive series of rumours.
Notoriously difficult to track, the ICA has discovered that the Target is in Paris on the trail of fashion designer Sebastian Sato, and will almost certainly attempt to get close to him to either interview or take photographs of him.
With the world’s attention on the show, and extensive security in place it will not be easy to locate and eliminate the Target without drawing attention.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_ZOMBIE_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your targets are YO JA KYUNG, a chemical scientist working for the ETHER CORPORATION, and his accomplice MAURICE DENDRY. We have discovered that these two plan to steal research into the ETHER DNA VIRUS, and that they plan to smuggle a sample out within the next 48 hours.
We must act immediately to eliminate both targets, and ensure that this sample is destroyed. It is likely that they have established a small biolab somewhere in the city, so locating this will be a priority.
If the virus gets into the open, it must be returned to cold storage quickly to avoid a deadly outbreak.
The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_ZOMBIE_OBJ_3_TITLE: The virus need to be secured
xx.UI_CONTRACT_ZOMBIE_OBJ_3_DESC: The virus need to be secured.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_MARTINI_DESC:
Good evening 47.
Your target is WEN TS’AI, the highly influential Southeast Asian food critic. He is notorious for his sadistic attention to detail and relentless criticism of the smallest errors.
The client is the partner of a Singaporean chef driven to suicide by the Target’s stream of cruel reviews over a bottle of over-chilled ice-water.
We have learned that the target will be at the HIMAPAN HOTEL in Bangkok, where he plans to review that hotel’s award winning cuisine. Complicating matters, the Target has recently retained a private security team in response to his increasing notoriety.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_GIMLET_DESC:
Good Afternoon 47,
I have the fourth profile available now. Your target is JOHN STUBBS, a retired mercenary, and former member of SIGMA.
This target is no longer active, having retired with a substantial fortune in offshore bank accounts. Our intelligence has been unable to turn up the source of this wealth, only that it is substantial enough to provide the target.
He is on holiday in Bangkok with his wife, but our background information indicates she is unaware of his past. The contract stipulates no actions with regard to her, so proceed at your discretion.
I’ll leave you to prepare.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_HARVEY_WALLBANGER_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your target is RICHARD J. MAGEE, an self-help guru infamous for abandoning his protégés as soon as their money runs out.
His current mark is Keith Keeble, and the young man’s trust fund. His family has turned to the ICA for help in rescuing their son (and his half-billion dollar inter vivos fund) from the guru’s clutches.
The family lawyer Catherine Feller has arranged a meeting with the Target in Sapienza Italy, ostensibly to discuss extending his access to the Trust Fund, and in so doing has provided us a window to engage.
Note that the contract stipulates that neither the son nor the lawyer Catherine Feller may be harmed.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BRASSMONKEY_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your targets are RICHARD EKWENSI, former Central-African Dictator, and his gold-digger wife INEZ. Following a brokered departure from power, the Targets have lived off the money they looted during their reign. The ICA has learned that the two will be at the HIMAPAN HOTEL in Bangkok at a clandestine meeting with a representative of French Intelligence.
The Targets have been avoiding media attention in recent months, and will likely not arrive at the hotel via the river. He takes no risks with his personal safety, so expect his security team to cover all possible approaches.
The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BUSHWHACKER_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is RICHARD M FOREMAN, a skilled infiltrator believed to be working with the Militia on an unknown operation on US soil.
The Target is a highly skilled actor, and our files link him with the successful impersonation of billionaire Charles Vanderblathe, where he siphoned hundreds of millions out of the Vanderblathe accounts over the course of three weeks.
The Contract has two objectives. Firstly, to eliminate the Target in such a way as to make it appear an unsuspicious death such as a fall, or drowning. Secondly to uncover files or data about the operation being planned.
Remember that the entire Colorado compound is an armed camp, so plan accordingly.
The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BUSHWHACKER_OBJ_1_TITLE: Eliminate Richard M. Foreman with a non-explosion accident
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BUSHWHACKER_OBJ_1_DESC: The Client requires that the Target be eliminated in a manner that will resemble an non-suspicious accident. As the Colorado militia camp is a highly alert area, you should avoid using any explosive accidents. You are advised to make use of falls, drownings or poisonings, instead.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BUSHWHACKER_OBJ_2_DESC: In addition to eliminating the Target, the client requests that you locate any information detailing the militia operation in which the Target will be participating.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_LUMUMBA_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is WALTER WILLIAMS, an up and coming fashion model with a history of blackmail. He is currently in Paris, participating in the Sanguine Fashion show.
The Target is carrying a memory stick, containing information he using to blackmail a former lover. The client asks that you locate and retrieve this memory stick.
As a model, the Target will be on the catwalk, but he will almost certainly also spend some time amongst the event’s guests.
This year’s Sanguine collection features heavy facial make-up, so mark your target carefully.
The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_MOSCOWMULE_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your targets are DOCTOR PAVEL FRYDEL and DOCTOR AKANE AKENAWA, brilliant and unethical transplant surgeons.
Both were involved in performing a transplant on a billionaire’s son. However, the transplant had been sourced illicitly in central Africa, and the patient died of hemorrhagic fever shortly after.
We have located the Targets at Gama in Hokkaido where they are key members of staff, and will enjoy a great deal of freedom of movement and protection within the facility itself.
The client offers a substantial bonus if the targets are eliminated in a manner appropriate to the death of their patient. As you know, the Gama facility has worked with infectious diseases, so you should be able to find something useful on site.
And I know you appreciate poetic justice.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_TAMAGOZAKE_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your targets are four members of a cult. Specifically, the cult leader Oybek Nabazov, and three of his co-called cult-brothers Akram, Akmal and Ansar.
Alarmingly, the Target appears to be a serial cult leader, connected to at least seven cult atrocities over the past 30 thirty years. All four targets are in Bangkok, where they are holding an art exhibition entitled “LIBERATION” and billed as an examination of life, death, and rebirth, as told through the lens of art, culture and tragedy.
The client indicates that this likely to be cover for an imminent cult operation in Thailand, so you must engage and eliminate all four targets as soon possible.
The exhibition is a darling of the global art scene, so expect a high level of collateral presence.
We wouldn’t want this to be easy, of course.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_PILSNER_DESC:
Good morning 47.
Your target is DANIEL VESTERGAARD, millionaire and captain of Danish industry. He was vacationing in Marrakesh and got caught up in the riots in that troubled city. A notorious drinker, the Target has been enjoying the hospitality of the Swedish Consulate in Marakesh.
However, the client, Danish National Intelligence Service, R.E.T., fears what the Target may reveal to his hosts while enjoying said hospitality.
To prevent Danish trade and state secrets from falling into Swedish hands, they request that we eliminate the Target before he reveals anything more, and retrieve any recordings that may have been made.
You will need to learn how many recordings or copies have been made, and retrieve them all while on site.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_MUDSLIDE_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is JAROMIR ZOTOV,
xx.UI_CONTRACT_DIRTY_OCTOPUS_OBJ_1_DESC:
The State Security Department operative known as "Ji-Hu" is notoriously elusive. The client consortium will deliver more information, but this will occur while the ICA operative is on the ground.

Hospital records, and on-site surveillance may also provide identifying information.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_DIRTY_OCTOPUS_DESC:
Good morning, 47.

Your target has been linked to a number of hybrid conflict operations in mainland China, South Korea and Japan. In a touching example of international cooperation, the intelligence services of all three nations have placed a combined Contract with us for the Target’s elimination.
We have learned that he has arrived at the Gama facility in Hokkaido for facial reconstruction surgery, a preferred technique of SSD operatives. This gives us a window to engage, but the very nature of this surgery will make him difficult to identify.
The clients are cooperating to gather information to identify the Target, and I will relay this on to you as I receive it. Be ready to improvise, however.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_FLIRTINI_DESC:
Good morning 47.
Your target is Pertti Järnefelt, bookkeeper to the global underworld and considered to be a criminal myth by Law Enforcement agencies the world over. In truth, the Target has lead an unassuming, yet comfortable life managing the finances of kleptocracies, terrorists and tyrants for decades.
The client, LOCKSLEY has assembled information on the Targets movements and conclusively linked him to the Shadow Client’s operations in Colorado. This makes his elimination a priority. The Target is, however, highly likely to vanish again once his visit to the Militia compound is complete, so we must act immediately.
Note that the Target is extremely paranoid, and will attempt to flee at the first sign of overt danger.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_PILSNER_OBJ_1_TITLE: Retrieve or destroy all Covert Recordings
xx.UI_CONTRACT_PILSNER_OBJ_1_DESC: The Client requests that you locate and retrieve all copies of any recordings made of the Target. You will have to discover how many recordings have been made while on site.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SEABREEZE_DESC:
Good evening 47,

I have the final profile available now. Your target is TAHEJI KOYAMA, codenamed “The Controller”. He is the final living member of the SIGMA paramilitary group, and with his elimination a particularly nasty chapter of recent history will be brought to a close.

In addition to eliminating the Target, you are also to locate and acquire digital files detailing SIGMA operations during the 90s. These are likely to be located in one of the hospital’s safes.

Hospital records indicate the Target suffers a rare genetic disease, but also that he has refused two full bone marrow donations on ethical grounds so far. Interesting. Clients at this particular hospital are not usually picky about where their life-extending therapy comes from.

While I have confirmed that he has learned of the deaths of the other members of SIGMA, he does not seem to have altered his security arrangements or movement patterns in any meaningful way.

Regardless, the hospital is highly secure, and it will be difficult to move freely, so I’ll leave you to prepare.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_PALOMA_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is HERMAN VANHOEK
xx.UI_CONTRACT_EARTHQUAKE_DESC:
Goof evening 47.
Your target is DJ SANGUE
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BLACKRUSSIAN_DESC:
Good Afternoon 47,

I have the next profile available now. Your target is PATRICK MORGAN, codenamed “The Mercenary”. He is a former member of the CICADA Deniable Operations unit, SIGMA, and is an expert in a wide range of combat techniques.

His last known operation for SIGMA was almost 12 months ago. ICA files indicate that the Target met with international environmental terrorist, Sean Rose in Luxemburg last winter. It is therefore highly likely that the he has been recruited by the Militia.

We have located a training facility used by the Militia in Colorado, and intercepts make it highly likely the Target is here.

The camp is well sited and defended, and your Target is a lethal combatant, who expects the worst following the mysterious deaths of four of his old unit. Take care, 47.

I’ll leave you to prepare.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SEABREEZE_OBJ_1_TITLE: Retrive SIGMA Operations Files without being spotted
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SEABREEZE_OBJ_1_DESC:
The client has requested that you retrieve files from the Gama facility's Director's computer. The files to be retrieved relate to Sigma paramilitary operations dating back to the mid '90s and promise to link CICADA to those operations.

Note that the Facility computer networks are managed by an an AI developed by Kronstadt Industries, and we have been informed that the AI will delete the files if any suspicious events occur within the facility. Ensure that you are not spotted at any time while conducting the mission, prior to retrieving the files.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SAKINI_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is GABRIEL SANTOS, a celebrity super-chef and an example of the immunity granted by wealth and public life. He has evaded any consequences to his career following a stream of assaults on assistants, producers and staff.
The Target will be in Paris providing luxury catering for Viktor Novikov and Dalia Margolis, and will have an entourage of social media producers and assistants around him at all times.
The client, a former investor in Santos' production company, specifically requests that the Target be eliminated tonight, so our operational window is slim.
The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_OBJ_1_TITLE: Eliminate Owen Cage with a Lethal Poison Syringe while disguised in Hazmat Suit
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_OBJ_2_DESC: Locate and retrieve all research that has been performed on the virus.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_OBJ_3_TITLE: Do Not Harm or Pacify the Target
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_OBJ_3_DESC: Harming, Subduing, or pacifying, or in any way rendering the Target unconcious will result in mission failure.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_OBJ_1_DESC: The Target is carrying a lethal haemmoraghic virus, which is highly infectious at close range. He is currently being held in a bio-containment facility, and only attended by staff in Hazmat suits. To approach him you must first acquire such a suit. In addition, the Client has indicated that the only completely safe way to eliminate the Target is the use of a lethal injection. Plan accordingly.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_PINKPANTHER_DESC:
Good Afternoon 47.
Your target is FITZ DENIS
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SIDECAR_DESC:
Good Afternoon 47.
Your target is TRENT PO
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SANGRIA_DESC:
Good Afternoon 47.
Your target is WILHELM "WILLY" SCHULZ
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SAZERAC_ALT_DESC:
Good evening, 47
Your Target is KURT WALTHER, personal assistant to CARDINAL ADALRICO CANDELARIA. He is known as the "Silent Man", and has never been heard to speak in public.
The Cardinal is visiting the church in Sapienza, where his itinerary states he will spend some time in prayer. He will be extremely well protected at all times.
The client requests that the target be eliminated without the Cardinal's knowledge, but they are seldom apart, so this may prove a challenge. Nothing you can't manage, I'm sure.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SINGAPORESLING_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is MI-CHA SUN
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SPRITZER_DESC:
Good morning 47.
Your targets are professional poker player Riley Hunter Moorefield and her assistant, known only as The Fisherman.
Moorefield is currently in Bangkok while participating in the Pacific Rim Poker Championship, where she has consistently won games, and substantial prizes.
She is known to operate together with an individual known only as “The Fisherman”, and together they have an unmatched win rate in both legal and illegal tournaments. Suspiciously so, in fact.
The Contract requires that both Moorefield and the Fisherman are eliminated, so you will need to determine the identity of this individual on-site.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_FLIRTINI_OBJ_2_DESC: The Client requests that you locate and steal the Target's ledger. The ledger contains financial details capable of identifying illicit fortunes and their owners across the world. A potent piece of evidence in the right hands.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_KAMIKAZE_DESC:
Good evening, 47
Your target is a black-hat hacker who goes by the handle “PROTAGONIST”. He is currently in Paris with his longtime partner known as “WHITECAP”. The two have been contracted by Dalia Margolis to execute a high profile hack, tonight.
No current pictures of the target exist, but he makes use of the hacker alias “Protagonist”, and he often references a particular brand of cheap fruit jam available in Alabama.
You will have to use this information to identify him.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_RACEHORSE_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is ZHEN "LOLRAPTOR2000" YÜ,
xx.UI_CONTRACT_HOTTODDY_DESC:
Good afternoon 47.
Your target is ETTA DAVIS, known in the more excitable media as “The Angel of Death”.
The target is a retired nurse, believed to have killed dozens of patients, in retirement homes and hospitals across Great Britain.
Her preferred technique is poison, though in later years she has begun to use blunt weapons and accidents, such as falls.
Ongoing intercepts have tracked her to Marrakesh. This matches profile predictions that she will expand her hunting grounds now that the net is tightening at home.
While the target may look like a harmless old lady, it is certain that she will kill again repeatedly, given the opportunity.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SNAKEBITE_DESC:
Good evening 47.
Your target is BRADLEY PAINE, a psychiatrist, specialising in helping individuals to overcome their moral and ethical limitations. And thus, preferred counsellor to mercenaries and terrorists the world over.
We have learned that he has been providing this service to Sean Rose’ Militia in Colorado, and that he is en-route that group’s compound. While this is a highly dangerous environment in which to operate, it is never-the-less our best opportunity to engage.
In addition to eliminating the target, the client asks that you also eliminate each person he meets and counsels, so as to hamper the Militia’s overall effectiveness.
The Target will certainly have a busy schedule amongst the militia’s mercenaries and extremists, but note that he is likely to know most or all of them by face. Plan accordingly.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_SNAKEBITE_OBJ_1_DESC:
Identify all patients who receive actual counselling from the Target. The client requires that you eliminate them.

Avoid collateral eliminations if possible.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_DESC:
Good evening 47.
Your target is OWEN CAGE, a bio-terrorist planning to attack Tokyo. He intentionally infected himself with a deadly Haemorrhagic Virus, but his plane was intercepted on the runway at Narita before he could put his plan into effect.
We have learned that target is currently in an isolation ward at the Gama facility in Hokkaido, under heavy psycho-pharmaceutical sedation.
The client strongly recommends that you follow full bio-isolation protocols when approaching the target.
You must eliminate the target with a lethal injection inside the isolation ward, and also locate and retrieve all research that has been performed on the virus.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_QUADRUPLERUMANDCOKE_DESC:
Good afternoon 47,
Your target is Hollywood legend and infamous loose cannon, Gary Busey, code named: “The Wild Card.”
He is in Sapienza to film an advertisement, but is now refusing to participate.
This fiasco has cost the client millions, and they have decided to terminate their relationship with the target permanently.
Complicating matters is the presence of an angry co-star, Gary Cole. However, he may just lead you straight to your target.
This is an odd one, indeed.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_MAITAI_OBJ_2_DESC: The Client requests that you locate and retrieve the guest list for the Soire Horrible. It seems highly unlikely that the Target would deign to concern himself with such things, so someone else in his entourage must be dealing with this. Expect the guest list to be stored in electronic format, most likely on a PDA, or perhaps a mobile memory drive.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_BLOODYMARY_OBJ_2_DESC: The Client requests that you retrieve any files and data pertaining to the Target's activities and network in West and Southern Africa. You will need to discover the location of these files while on site. Be aware that the Target is likely to be highly protective of them.
xx.UI_CONTRACT_LUMUMBA_OBJ_2_DESC: The Target keeps the originals of all his blackmail material with him at all times, on a portable memory drive. The Client requests that you retrieve it once you have eliminated the Target.

en.UI_CONTRACT_SAZERAC_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your target is Father Adalrico Candelaria, a catholic cardinal considered by Vatican insiders to be a strong contender for the next pope.
However, ICA files indicate a series of links between the target and the Pinochet regime in Chile in the '70s and '80s.
The target is currently on a tour of Europe with a stopover at the church in Sapienza where his itinerary states he will spend some time in prayer. He will be extremely well protected at all times by multiple layers of highly alert security.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_MAI_TAI_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your target calls himself Mr. Giggles, and operates an underground circus called the Soirée Horrible. Attractions include animal fights, deadly blood-sports and other choreographed violence.
We are uncertain why he is in Marrakesh, only that he is somewhere in the city center. You will need to locate him on the ground, and engage at your discretion.
He should be simple enough to spot, at least.
The client requires that in addition to eliminating the target you also acquire his client list. Given the target’s personality, he is unlikely to manage such matters himself, so you will need to discover its location on site.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_PISCO_SOUR_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Dylan Narváez, currently in Sapienza with his identical twin brother, Gonzales.
The Narváez brothers are tobacco billionaires and mainly operate in mainland China. Note that Gonzales Narváez is not to be harmed, and the contract will be canceled if he is injured in any manner. As they are identical twins, you will have to choose your target with supreme care.
We have learned that the target has recently purchased a one-of-a-kind, platinum Mangôt wristwatch, so if you can get close enough, this will help you identify him.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BLUE_BLAZER_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Scott Sarno, director of European Operations for the CICADA private military corporation.
He is a 30-year veteran of clandestine operations, and our files link him to a number of questionable operations in Europe and the Middle East as far back as the mid-'90s.
The client has indicated the target to be highly trained and observant. You should expect him to be accompanied by several CICADA agents at all times.
en.UI_CONTRACT_MIMOSA_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
I have the second profile online now.
Your target is Gary Lunn, a high-security operative at the Ether Corporation. We have learned that he has arrived at the Ether biolab in the Italian town of Sapienza to supervise security there.
Although your target was part of the same CICADA paramilitary unit as Scott Sarno, there is no indication that the target has learned of his colleague’s death.
However, you should expect access to be restricted and on-site security to be heavy.
I’ll leave you to prepare.
en.UI_CONTRACT_GINFIZZ_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
I have the third profile uploaded. Your target is Walter Menard. Like both previous targets, he is a veteran of the paramilitary Sigma unit, active during the Yugoslav War of the '90s.
My research has uncovered a series of disappearances and massacres in the area where Sigma was operating, which may be related to the contract.
Your target has been tasked with handling the evacuation of rogue banker Claus Hugo Strandberg, and we believe he is currently attached as an advisor to General Zaydan in Marrakesh. The city is on the brink of a military coup, so you should have cover to operate. I’ll leave you to prepare.
en.04643101: A small plastic bag with clear, fine-cut diamonds.
en.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_OBJ_2_DESC:
The ICA has no information on the current location of Strandberg's diamonds.

However, the Target, Xander Haverfoek, often makes use of dead-drops and third parties when moving valuable and sensitive merchandise. We expect him to meet a courier in the city center to hand over the location of the diamonds. This courier will then make the pickup from a third party, and transport the diamonds to a third location.
en.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_OBJ_2_BRIEF: Track the courier to the diamonds.
en.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Xander Haverfoek, attached to the Swedish consulate in Marrakesh. We are expecting him to meet a courier in the city to hand off a consignment of diamonds on behalf of Claus Hugo Strandberg.
You must both retrieve the package and eliminate the target.
We have been unable to obtain any information on where this package is located, so you will need to shadow either the target or the courier to discover its location.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_OBJ_3_DESC: After the courier has made the pickup, we expect him to proceed to a secure third location, and await further instructions. Retrieve the diamonds from the courier by any means necessary, but ideally avoiding collateral damage.
en.UI_CONTRACT_SCREWDRIVER_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Vito Đurić, a highly successful arms dealer and sanctions-buster. While he is the subject of a global manhunt by law enforcement agencies, the target has successfully evaded capture or escaped prosecution by other means for more than a decade.
We believe he is in Marrakesh to finalize the sale of a considerable load of weapons to the mercenaries who helped bust Strandberg out of prison. Despite tight security, we believe this is the best opportunity to eliminate him before he vanishes again.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_KIRROYAL_DESC:
Your target is Nila Torvik, a brilliant pharmaceuticals scientist and CEO of Torvik Research. Her company is a major provider of low-cost, generic drugs to the developing world. We have learnt that she has been involved in a special project on behalf of IAGO but have no specifics at this time.
She will be attending the IAGO auction in Paris as a personal guest of Dalia Margolis. Be aware that Torvik may have been been warned of a potential assassination attempt, so you should expect her to be highly suspicious.
en.UI_CONTRACT_MARGARITA_DESC:
Your target is Sir Howard Moxon, an international antiquities trader. He is in Paris to facilitate the sale of the Ivory White, a World War II treasure looted in the siege of Berlin. We believe this is the third time that the target has sold the White, replacing the original with a forgery each time.
He is attending the party surrounding the Sanguine fashion show.
en.UI_CONTRACT_MARGARITA_OBJ_2_DESC: The Ivory White is a fine filigree egg of pre-revolutionary Russian provenance. Its last known location was in the Novodonskoy Monastery where it was being stored alongside other treasures of the tsarist era. When the monastery was captured during the Nazi German advance on Moscow, the Ivory White vanished and subsequently passed into private hands after the war where it became something of a myth among art collectors. While it has never been in a public auction, similar items have fetched in excess of £20 million.
en.UI_CONTRACT_TEQUILA_SUNRISE_DESC:
Your target is Sergei Larin, an accomplished art forger who has been copying and the selling the museum’s crown jewels to finance his extravagant lifestyle. In reality, both museum and artworks are owned by his wife, Simone Larin, and have been in her family for generations.
While his wife is in New York with an excellent alibi, you have a window of opportunity to engage.
en.UI_CONTRACT_WHITE_RUSSIAN_DESC:
Your target is Brendan Conner, an IT billionaire who built his fortune on darknet identity theft, money laundering, and the sale of narcotics and weapons.
We do not have much information, but intel indicates that he will be attending the IAGO auction and has hired an escort to join him at the cocktail reception on the ground floor.
We can assume the target will be mobile, so you will have to locate him and improvise onsite.
en.UI_CONTRACT_DARK_AND_STORMY_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is documentary-maker Phillipos Kaphanopolis. He is investigating rumors that Dino Bosco was assassinated, and he believes that the film studio was responsible. The ICA has confirmed the leak was not on our end, and your work, as always, was impeccable.
You will be returning to Sapienza to eliminate the target before he draws more attention to the matter.
We believe he will be accompanied by his producer Craig Black, and a cameraman. Sapienza is hosting the annual town festival, and we expect security to be higher than normal.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_MINT_JULEP_DESC:
Good morning, 47.
Your target is Congressman Anthony L. Troutt, a veteran of the Invasion of Grenada in 1983. Reports linking him to a number of friendly-fire accidents were suppressed after the conflict and never become public record.
He is staying with Silvio Caruso in Sapienza as a part of a meet-and-greet with European moneymen and power brokers ahead of a possible presidential bid in 2024.
Expect additional security and at least one personal assistant to be close to the target at all times.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_CAIPIRINHA_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is media personality Bartholomew Argus. The charismatic musician-turned-film-star is at the epicenter of a drugs and weapons investigation in the UK and the subject of an Interpol arrest order. The target has gone underground, leaving his former business partner and infamous London gangster, Tommy "The Hammer" Stoakes to take the blame.
We have learned that the target is lying low in Sapienza as a guest of Dino Bosco, and this represents an ideal window of opportunity to engage.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BLOODYMARY_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Adeze Oijofor, also known under her war name of Nne Obara, or “Bloody Mamma.” She operates groups of militants and bandits across West Africa and controls a sizeable chunk of the rare-earth trade out of that region. Following French interventions across the sub-continent, she is looking to secure her legacy by connecting her son with Richard Ekwensi.
She is currently staying at the Phraya Cosmopolitane where her entourage has taken over an entire floor while she waits for Ekwensi to arrive.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_THELASTWORD_OBJ_1_TITLE: Steal the PDA with the unfinished manuscript
en.UI_CONTRACT_TAMAGOZAKE_OBJ_1_DESC: The client requests that you eliminate Oybek Nabazov's three lieutenants, indicating that these three individuals are being primed for an imminent attack. They are massively indoctrinated and will be close to the target at all times. It should be easy enough to eliminate them, assuming collateral casualties can be avoided.
en.UI_CONTRACT_THELASTWORD_OBJ_1_DESC: The client requests that you locate and retrieve the latest manuscript.
en.UI_CONTRACT_THELASTWORD_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Craig Black, the highly successful author of the Cassandra Snow young-adult novels.
While the novels, spin-off TV series and movie trilogies are reviled by reviewers, they have made the Target enormously wealthy.
The client is the ghostwriter of the original novels, and has been cheated out of fame and the financial success by the Target. She requests that you locate and retrieve the latest manuscript in addition to eliminating the Target, in order to prevent it being posthumously published.
We have learned that the Target will be reading sections of the latest manuscript in Sapienza tonight, which gives you a window to engage.
The New England Wiccan novels are hugely successful, so the reading is invitation only and expected to be packed. There is no accounting for taste.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_SHANDY_DESC:
Your target is multi-platinum media sensation Jonathan Smythe. He is the subject of an international manhunt, following his involvement in a multiple homicide three years ago. He fled prosecution, but continues to release records, and maintains an extensive financial empire that has only been bolstered by the controversy.

We have learned that he will be hosting a private party somewhere in the palace grounds. This is the first opportunity to engage in over three years, so we must act immediately. 

The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
en.UI_CONTRACT_MOJITO_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Kieran Hudson, a controversial tabloid journalist. The client is a former victim of the target’s smear articles and wants the journalist eliminated in retaliation for a particularly destructive series of rumors.
The ICA has discovered that the target is in Paris on the trail of fashion designer Sebastian Sato. He will almost certainly attempt to get close to Sato either to interview or take photographs of him.
With the world’s attention on the show, and extensive security in place, it will not be easy to locate and eliminate the target without drawing attention.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_ZOMBIE_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your targets are Yo Ja Kyung, a chemical scientist working for the Ether Corporation, and his accomplice, Maurice Dendry. We have discovered that these two plan to steal research on the Ether DNA virus, and that they plan to smuggle a sample out within the next 48 hours.
We must act immediately to eliminate both targets and ensure that this sample is destroyed. It is likely that they have established a small biolab somewhere in the city, so locating this will be a priority.
If the virus gets into the open, it must be returned to cold storage quickly to avoid a deadly outbreak.
The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
en.UI_CONTRACT_ZOMBIE_OBJ_3_TITLE: The virus needs to be secured
en.UI_CONTRACT_ZOMBIE_OBJ_3_DESC: The virus need to be secured.
en.UI_CONTRACT_MARTINI_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your target is Wen Ts’ai, the highly influential Southeast Asian food critic. He is notorious for his sadistic attention to detail and relentless criticism of the smallest errors.
The client is the partner of a Singaporean chef driven to suicide by the Target’s stream of cruel reviews over a bottle of over-chilled ice-water.
We have learned that the target will be at the Himmapan Hotel in Bangkok, where he plans to review that hotel’s award winning cuisine. Complicating matters, the Target has recently retained a private security team in response to his increasing notoriety.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_GIMLET_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
I have the fourth profile available now. Your target is John Stubbs, a retired mercenary, and former member of Sigma.
This target is no longer active, having retired with a substantial fortune in offshore bank accounts. Our intelligence has been unable to turn up the source of this wealth, only that it is substantial enough to provide the target with a life of luxury.
He is on holiday in Bangkok with his wife, but our background information indicates she is unaware of his past. The contract stipulates no actions with regard to her, so proceed at your discretion.
I’ll leave you to prepare.
en.UI_CONTRACT_HARVEY_WALLBANGER_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your target is Richard J. Magee, a self-help guru infamous for abandoning his protégés as soon as their money runs out.
His current mark is Keith Keeble and the young man’s trust fund. His family has turned to the ICA for help in rescuing their son, and his half-billion dollar inter vivos fund, from the guru’s clutches.
The family lawyer Catherine Feller has arranged a meeting with the target in Sapienza, Italy, ostensibly to discuss extending his access to the trust fund, and in so doing has provided us a window to engage.
Note that the contract stipulates that neither the son nor the lawyer Catherine Feller may be harmed.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BRASSMONKEY_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your targets are Richard Ekwensi, former Central-African Dictator, and his gold-digger wife Inez. Following a brokered departure from power, the Targets have lived off the money they looted during their reign. The ICA has learned that the two will be at the Himmapan Hotel in Bangkok at a clandestine meeting with a representative of French Intelligence.
The Targets have been avoiding media attention in recent months, and will likely not arrive at the hotel via the river. He takes no risks with his personal safety, so expect his security team to cover all possible approaches.
The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BUSHWHACKER_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Richard M. Foreman, a skilled infiltrator believed to be working with the militia on an unknown operation on US soil.
The target is a highly skilled actor, and our files link him with the successful impersonation of billionaire Charles Vanderblathe, where he siphoned hundreds of millions out of the Vanderblathe accounts over the course of three weeks.
The contract has two objectives: identifying and eliminating the target in an apparently accidental death such as a fall, or drowning; secondly, uncover files or data about the operation being planned.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BUSHWHACKER_OBJ_1_TITLE: Eliminate Richard M. Foreman with a non-explosion accident
en.UI_CONTRACT_BUSHWHACKER_OBJ_1_DESC: The client requires that the target be eliminated in a manner that will resemble an non-suspicious accident. As the Colorado militia camp is a high-alert area, you should avoid causing any explosion accidents. You are instead advised to make use of falls, drownings or poisonings.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BUSHWHACKER_OBJ_2_DESC: In addition to eliminating the Target, the client requests that you locate any information detailing the militia operation in which the Target will be participating.
en.UI_CONTRACT_LUMUMBA_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Walter Williams, an up-and-coming fashion model with a history of blackmail. He is currently in Paris, participating in the Sanguine Fashion show.
The target is carrying a memory stick containing information he is using to blackmail a former lover. The client asks that you locate and retrieve this memory stick.
As a model, the target will be on the catwalk, but he will almost certainly also spend some time amongst the event’s guests.
This year’s Sanguine collection features heavy facial makeup, so mark your target carefully.
The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
en.UI_CONTRACT_MOSCOWMULE_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your targets are Dr. Pavel Frydel and Dr. Akane Akenawa, brilliant and unethical transplant surgeons.
Both were involved in performing an operation on a billionaire’s son. However, the organ had been sourced illicitly in Central Africa, and the patient died of hemorrhagic fever shortly after.
We have located the targets at Gama in Hokkaido, where they are key members of staff and will enjoy a great deal of freedom of movement and protection within the facility itself.
The client offers a substantial bonus if the targets are eliminated in a manner appropriate to the death of their patient. As you know, the Gama facility has worked with infectious diseases, so you should be able to find something useful on site.
And I know you appreciate poetic justice.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_TAMAGOZAKE_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your targets are four members of a cult. Specifically, the cult leader Oybek Nabazov, and three of his co-called cult-brothers Akram, Akmal and Ansar.
Alarmingly, the Target appears to be a serial cult leader, connected to at least seven cult atrocities over the past 30 years. All four targets are in Bangkok, where they are holding an art exhibition entitled “LIBERATION” billed as an examination of life, death, and rebirth, as told through the lens of art, culture and tragedy.
The client indicates that this likely to be cover for an imminent cult operation in Thailand, so you must engage and eliminate all four targets as soon possible.
The exhibition is a darling of the global art scene, so expect a high level of collateral presence.
We wouldn’t want this to be easy, of course.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_PILSNER_DESC:
Good morning, 47.
Your target is DANIEL VESTERGAARD, millionaire and captain of Danish industry. He was vacationing in Marrakesh and got caught up in the riots in that troubled city. A notorious drinker, the Target has been enjoying the hospitality of the Swedish Consulate in Marakesh.
However, the client, Danish National Intelligence Service, R.E.T., fears what the Target may reveal to his hosts while enjoying said hospitality.
To prevent Danish trade and state secrets from falling into Swedish hands, they request that we eliminate the Target before he reveals anything more, and retrieve any recordings that may have been made.
You will need to learn how many recordings or copies have been made, and retrieve them all while on site.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_DIRTY_OCTOPUS_OBJ_1_DESC:
The State Security Department operative known as "Ji-Hu" is notoriously elusive. The client consortium will deliver more information, but this will occur while the ICA operative is on the ground.

Hospital records, and on-site surveillance may also provide identifying information.
en.UI_CONTRACT_DIRTY_OCTOPUS_DESC:
Good morning, 47.

Your target has been linked to a number of hybrid conflict operations in mainland China, South Korea and Japan. In a touching example of international cooperation, the intelligence services of all three nations have placed a combined Contract with us for the Target’s elimination.
We have learned that he has arrived at the Gama facility in Hokkaido for facial reconstruction surgery, a preferred technique of SSD operatives. This gives us a window to engage, but the very nature of this surgery will make him difficult to identify.
The clients are cooperating to gather information to identify the Target, and I will relay this on to you as I receive it. Be ready to improvise, however.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_FLIRTINI_DESC:
Good morning, 47.
Your target is Pertti Järnefelt, bookkeeper to the global underworld and considered to be a criminal myth by law enforcement agencies the world over. In truth, the target has lead an unassuming yet comfortable life managing the finances of kleptocracies, terrorists and tyrants for decades.
The client, Locksley, has assembled information on the target's movements and conclusively linked him to the shadow client’s operations in Colorado. This makes his elimination a priority.
The client has also requested that you retrieve the target's ledger.Note that the target is extremely paranoid and will attempt to flee at the first sign of overt danger.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_PILSNER_OBJ_1_TITLE: Retrieve or destroy all Covert Recordings
en.UI_CONTRACT_PILSNER_OBJ_1_DESC: Retrieve or destroy all Covert Recordings
en.UI_CONTRACT_SEABREEZE_DESC:
Good Evening, 47.
I have the final profile available now. Your target is Taheji Koyama, codenamed “The Controller.” He is the final living member of the Sigma paramilitary group, and with his elimination, a particularly nasty chapter of recent history will be brought to a close.
In addition to eliminating the target, you are also to locate and acquire digital files detailing Sigma operations during the ‘90s. These are likely to be located in one of the hospital safes.
Hospital records indicate the target suffers a rare genetic disease, but also that he has refused two full bone marrow donations on ethical grounds. Interesting. Clients at this particular hospital are not usually picky about where their life-extending therapy comes from.
While I have confirmed that he has learned of the deaths of the other members of Sigma, he does not seem to have altered his security arrangements or movement patterns in any meaningful way.
Regardless, the hospital is highly secure, and it will be difficult to move freely, so I’ll leave you to prepare.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BLACKRUSSIAN_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.

I have the next profile available now. Your target is Patrick Morgan, codenamed “The Mercenary”. He is a former member of the CICADA Deniable Operations unit, Sigma, and is an expert in a wide range of combat techniques.

His last known operation for Sigma was almost 12 months ago. ICA files indicate that the target met with international environmental terrorist, Sean Rose, in Luxembourg last winter. It is therefore most probable that the he has been recruited by the Militia.

We have located a training facility used by the Militia in Colorado, and intercepts make it highly likely the target is here.

The camp is well sited and defended, and your target is a lethal combatant, who expects the worst following the mysterious deaths of four of his old unit. Take care, 47.

I’ll leave you to prepare.
en.UI_CONTRACT_SEABREEZE_OBJ_1_TITLE: Retrieve Sigma operations files without getting spotted
en.UI_CONTRACT_SEABREEZE_OBJ_1_DESC:
The client has requested that you retrieve files from the Gama facility's Director's computer. The files to be retrieved relate to Sigma paramilitary operations dating back to the mid '90s and promise to link CICADA to those operations.

Note that the Facility computer networks are managed by an an AI developed by Kronstadt Industries, and we have been informed that the AI will delete the files if any suspicious events occur within the facility. Ensure that you are not spotted at any time while conducting the mission, prior to retrieving the files.
en.UI_CONTRACT_SAKINI_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Gabriel Santos, a celebrity super chef and an example of the immunity granted by wealth and public life. He has evaded any consequences to his career following a stream of assaults on assistants, producers and staff.
The target will be in Paris providing luxury catering for Viktor Novikov and Dalia Margolis and will have an entourage of social media producers and assistants around him at all times.
The client, a former investor in Santos' production company, specifically requests that the target be eliminated tonight, so our operational window is slim.
The clock is ticking. Good luck, 47.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_OBJ_1_TITLE: Eliminate Owen Cage with a Lethal Poison Syringe while disguised in a Hazmat Suit
en.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_OBJ_2_DESC: Locate and retrieve all research that has been performed on the virus.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_OBJ_3_TITLE: Do Not Harm or Pacify the Target
en.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_OBJ_3_DESC: Harming, subduing, pacifying, or in any way rendering the Target unconscious will result in mission failure.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_OBJ_1_DESC: The Target is carrying a lethal hemorrhagic virus, which is highly infectious at close range. He is currently being held in a bio-containment facility, and only attended by staff in hazmat suits. To approach him you must first acquire such a suit. In addition, the Client has indicated that the only completely safe way to eliminate the Target is the use of a lethal injection. Plan accordingly.
en.UI_CONTRACT_SAZERAC_ALT_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your target is Kurt Walther, personal assistant to Cardinal Adalrico Candelaria. He is known as the "Silent Man" and has never been heard to speak in public.
The cardinal is visiting the church in Sapienza where his itinerary states he will spend some time in prayer. He will be extremely well protected at all times.
The client requests that the target be eliminated without the cardinal's knowledge, but they are seldom apart, so this may prove a challenge. Nothing you can't manage, I'm sure.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_SPRITZER_DESC:
Good morning, 47.
Your targets are professional poker player Riley Hunter Moorefield and her assistant, known only as The Fisherman.
Moorefield is currently in Bangkok while participating in the Pacific Rim Poker Championship, where she has consistently won games, and substantial prizes.
She is known to operate together with an individual known only as “The Fisherman”, and together they have an unmatched win rate in both legal and illegal tournaments. Suspiciously so, in fact.
The Contract requires that both Moorefield and the Fisherman are eliminated, so you will need to determine the identity of this individual on-site.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_FLIRTINI_OBJ_2_DESC: The client requests that you locate and steal the target's ledger. The ledger contains financial details capable of identifying illicit fortunes and their owners across the world, a potent piece of evidence, in the right hands.
en.UI_CONTRACT_KAMIKAZE_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your target is a black hat hacker who goes by the handle “Protagonist.” He is currently in Paris with his longtime partner known as “Whitecap.” The two have been contracted by Dalia Margolis to execute a high-profile hack tonight.
No current pictures of the target exist, but he makes use of the hacker alias Protagonist, and he often references a particular brand of cheap fruit jam available in Alabama.
You will have to use this information to identify him.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_HOTTODDY_DESC:
Good afternoon, 47.
Your target is Etta Davis, also known as “The Angel of Death.”
The target is a retired nurse believed to have killed dozens of patients in retirement homes and hospitals across Great Britain.
Her preferred technique is poison, though in later years she has begun to prefer blunt weapons and violent accidents, such as falls.
Ongoing intercepts have tracked her to Marrakesh. This matches profile predictions that she is expanding her hunting grounds now that the net is tightening at home.
While the target may look like a harmless old lady, it is certain that she will kill again repeatedly, given the opportunity.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_SNAKEBITE_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your target is Bradley Paine, a psychiatrist, specializing in helping individuals to overcome their moral and ethical limitations. And thus, preferred counsellor to mercenaries and terrorists the world over.
We have learned that he has been providing this service to Sean Rose’s Militia in Colorado, and that he is en-route that group’s compound. While this is a highly dangerous environment in which to operate, it is nevertheless our best opportunity to engage.
In addition to eliminating the target, the client asks that you also eliminate each person he meets and counsels, so as to hamper the Militia’s overall effectiveness.
The Target will certainly have a busy schedule amongst the militia’s mercenaries, but note that he is likely to know most or all of them by face. Plan accordingly.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_SNAKEBITE_OBJ_2_DESC: This member of the Militia has been infected by the virus. Identify the target by uncovering intel and expect ongoing intel from your handler.
en.UI_CONTRACT_SNAKEBITE_OBJ_1_DESC:
Identify all patients who receive actual counseling from the target. The client requires that you eliminate them.

Avoid collateral eliminations if possible.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BRONX_DESC:
Good evening, 47.
Your target is Owen Cage, a bio-terrorist planning to attack Tokyo. He intentionally infected himself with a deadly Hemorrhagic Virus, but his plane was intercepted on the runway at Narita before he could put his plan into effect.
We have learned that target is currently in an isolation ward at the Gama facility in Hokkaido, under heavy sedation.
The client strongly recommends that you follow full bio-isolation protocols when approaching the target.
You must eliminate the target with a lethal injection inside the isolation ward, and also locate and retrieve all research that has been performed on the virus.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_QUADRUPLERUMANDCOKE_DESC:
Good afternoon 47,
Your target is Hollywood legend and infamous loose cannon, Gary Busey, code named: “The Wild Card.”
He is in Sapienza to film an advertisement, but is now refusing to participate.
This fiasco has cost the client millions, and they have decided to terminate their relationship with the target permanently.
Complicating matters is the presence of an angry co-star, Gary Cole. However, he may just lead you straight to your target.
This is an odd one, indeed.
The clock is ticking, 47. Good luck.
en.UI_CONTRACT_MAITAI_OBJ_2_DESC: The Client requests that you locate and retrieve the guest list for the Soirée Horrible. It seems highly unlikely that the Target would deign to concern himself with such things, so someone else in his entourage must be dealing with this. Expect the guest list to be stored in an electronic format, most likely on a PDA, or perhaps a mobile memory drive.
en.UI_CONTRACT_BLOODYMARY_OBJ_2_DESC: The client requests that you retrieve any files and data pertaining to the target's activities and network in West and Southern Africa. You will need to discover the location of these files while on site. Be aware that the target is likely to be highly protective of them.
en.UI_CONTRACT_LUMUMBA_OBJ_2_DESC: The Target keeps the originals of all his blackmail material with him at all times, on a memory stick. The Client requests that you retrieve it once you have eliminated the Target.

fr.UI_CONTRACT_SAZERAC_DESC:
Bonsoir, 47.
Votre cible est le père Adalrico Candelaria, un cardinal de l'Église catholique considéré par nos sources au Vatican comme un candidat sérieux pour l'élection du prochain pape.
Cependant, les dossiers de l'ICA montrent une série de liens entre la cible et le régime chilien de Pinochet dans les années 70 et 80. La cible est actuellement en voyage en Europe, avec une escale à l'église de Sapienza, dans laquelle, d'après son programme, il s'arrêtera pour prier. Il sera bien entendu constamment protégé par un système de sécurité renforcé.
Vous n'avez pas une minute à perdre. Bonne chance, 47.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_MAI_TAI_DESC:
Bonsoir, 47.
Votre cible, qui se fait appeler "M. Giggles", gère un cirque clandestin appelé Soirée horrible. Ses attractions comprennent combats d'animaux, affrontements sportifs sanglants et autres spectacles macabres.
La cible se trouve dans le centre de Marrakech, pour des raisons que nous ignorons. Il vous faudra le localiser sur le terrain et choisir votre approche.
Quoi qu'il en soit, le repérer ne devrait pas être un problème.
Le commanditaire exige également la récupération de la liste des clients. Au vu de la personnalité de la cible, ce n'est vraisemblablement pas elle qui s'occupe de cet aspect, il vous faudra donc trouver l'emplacement de la liste sur le terrain.
Vous n'avez pas une minute à perdre, 47. Bonne chance.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_PISCO_SOUR_DESC:
Bonjour, 47.
Votre cible est Dylan Narváez. Il est en ce moment même à Sapienza, avec son jumeau, Gonzales. Les frères Narváez sont des milliardaires de l'industrie du tabac, et travaillent principalement en Chine continentale. Attention, Gonzales ne doit en aucun cas être blessé, ou le contrat sera annulé. Étant donné que les deux frères se ressemblent comme deux gouttes d'eau, vous devrez choisir votre cible avec le plus grand soin.
Nos informations indiquent que Dylan s'est récemment procuré une montre unique au monde, de marque Platinum Mangôt. Approchez-vous suffisamment, et elle devrait vous permettre de reconnaître votre cible..
Vous n'avez pas une minute à perdre, 47. Bonne chance.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_BLUE_BLAZER_DESC:
Bonjour, 47.
Votre cible est Scott Sarno, directeur des opérations en Europe de CICADA Private Military Corporation.
C'est un vétéran avec 30 ans d'opérations clandestines derrière lui, et nos fichiers le relient à un nombre d'opérations douteuses en Europe et en Moyen-Orient, dont certaines remontent au milieu des années 90.
Le client a indiqué que la cible était très entraînée et observatrice. Attendez-vous à ce qu'il soit en permanence accompagné par plusieurs agents CICADA.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_MIMOSA_DESC:
Bonjour, 47.
J'ai accès au second profil en-ligne.
Votre cible est Gary Lunn, un agent de haute sécurité chez Ether Corporation. Nous avons appris qu'il était arrivé au laboratoire biologique d'Ether dans la ville de Sapienza, en Italie, pour superviser la sécurité sur place.
Bien que votre cible fasse partie de la même unité paramilitaire CICADA que Scott Sarno, il n'existe pas d'élément indiquant que la cible ait appris la mort de son collègue.
Attendez-vous cependant à un accès restreint, et à une sécurité importante sur place.
Je vous laisse à vos préparatifs.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_GINFIZZ_DESC:
Bonjour, 47.
Le troisième profil a été mis en ligne. Votre cible est Walter Menard. À l'instar de ses deux cibles précédentes, c'est un vétéran du groupe paramilitaire Sigma, actif durant les guerres de Yougoslavie dans les années 90.
Mes recherches ont révélé une série de disparitions et de massacres dans la zone où Sigma opérait, qui pourrait être en relation avec le contrat.
Votre cible a pour tâche de gérer l'évacuation du banquier et escroc Claus Hugo Strandberg, et nous pensons qu'il est en ce moment même attaché au général Zaydan à Marrakech, en tant que conseiller. La ville est au bord du coup d'État, vous devriez donc passer inaperçu. Je vous laisse à vos préparatifs.
fr.04643101: Un petit sac plastique contenant des diamants purs et finement taillés.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_OBJ_2_DESC:
L'ICA n'a aucune information sur l'endroit où peuvent se trouver les diamants de Strandberg.

Cependant, la cible, Xander Haverfoek, utilise souvent des boîtes-aux-lettres mortes et autres tierces parties pour déplacer des marchandises délicates et de valeur. Nous nous attendons à ce qu'il rencontre un coursier dans le centre-ville afin de lui donner la location des diamants. Ce coursier ira ensuite les récupérer d'une tierce-partie et les déposer dans un lieu sécurisé.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_OBJ_2_BRIEF: Suivez le coursier jusqu'à ce qu'il récupère les diamants.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_DESC:
Bonjour, 47.
Votre cible est Xander Haverfoek, attaché au consulat de Suède à Marrakech. Il doit rencontrer un coursier en ville pour lui remettre une livraison de diamants pour le compte de Claus Hugo Strandberg.
Vous devez à la fois récupérer le colis et éliminer la cible.
Nous n'avons réussi à obtenir aucune information sur l'emplacement du paquet, vous devrez donc prendre en filature soit la cible, soit le coursier pour découvrir où il se trouve.
Vous n'avez pas une minute à perdre, 47. Bonne chance.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_COSMOPOLITAN_OBJ_3_DESC: Une fois que le coursier aura fait sa collecte, nous nous attendons à ce qu'il se dirige vers un troisième lieu sécurisé et qu'il attende ses prochaines instructions. Faites le nécessaire pour prendre les diamants au coursier, mais idéalement sans créer de dommages collatéraux.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_SCREWDRIVER_DESC:
Bonjour, 47.
Votre cible est Vito Đurić, un important vendeur d'armes spécialisé dans les affaires avec les pays sous sanctions économiques. Bien que faisant l'objet d'une chasse à l'homme internationale par les autorités, la cible a réussi à s'évader ainsi qu'à éviter les poursuites par différents moyens, et ce pendant plus de dix ans.
Nous pensons qu'il est à Marrakech pour finaliser la vente d'une quantité considérable d'armes aux mercenaires qui ont aidé à faire sortir Strandberg de prison. Malgré les mesures de sécurité très importantes, nous pensons que cette occasion est la meilleure pour l'éliminer avant qu'il ne disparaisse une nouvelle fois.
Vous n'avez pas une minute à perdre, 47. Bonne chance.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_KIRROYAL_DESC:
Votre cible est Nila Torvik, une brillante scientifique dans l'industrie pharmaceutique et PDG de Torvik Research. Son entreprise est l'un des principaux fournisseurs de médicaments génériques à bas prix pour les pays en voie de développement. Nous avons appris qu'elle était impliquée dans un projet spécial pour le compte de IAGO, mais nous n'avons pour l'instant aucun détail.
Elle assistera à la vente aux enchères d'IAGO à Paris en tant qu'invitée personnelle de Dalia Margolis. Il est possible qu'elle ait été avertie d'une possible tentative d'assassinat ; attendez-vous donc à ce qu'elle soit sur ses gardes.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_MARGARITA_DESC:
Votre cible est Howard Moxon, un négociant d'antiquités à l'international. Il est à Paris pour faciliter la vente de le Blanc d'ivoire, un trésor de la Deuxième Guerre Mondiale volé à Berlin. Nous pensons que c'est la troisième fois que la cible vend cet objet, remplaçant l'original par un faux à chaque fois.
Il assiste à la soirée organisée pour le défilé Sanguine.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_MARGARITA_OBJ_2_DESC: Le Blanc d'ivoire est un œuf filigrané, provenant d'avant la révolution russe. Son dernier emplacement connu est le monastère Novodonskoy, où il fut stocké auprès d'autres trésors de l'ère tsariste. Quand le monastère fut capturé durant la progression des nazis vers Moscou, le Blanc d'ivoire disparut, et fit ensuite partie d'une collection privée après la guerre, où il devint une sorte de mythe parmi les collectionneurs. Bien qu'il n'eut jamais été mis aux enchères auparavant, des objets similaires ont rapporté plus de 20 millions de livres.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_TEQUILA_SUNRISE_DESC:
Votre cible est Sergei Larin, un faussaire expérimenté qui a copié et vendu les joyaux de la couronne du musée pour financer son train de vie extravagant. En réalité, à la fois le musée et l'œuvre appartiennent à sa femme, Simone Larin, et à sa famille depuis des générations.
Pendant que sa femme est à New York avec un parfait alibi, vous avez une occasion pour éliminer la cible.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_WHITE_RUSSIAN_DESC:
Votre cible est Brendan Conner, un milliardaire de l'informatique qui a bâti sa fortune grâce à de l'usurpation d'identités sur le darknet, du blanchiment d'argent et de la vente de drogues et d'armes.
Nous n'avons pas beaucoup d'informations mais nos renseignements nous indiquent qu'il sera présent à la vente aux enchères d'IAGO et qu'il a engagé une escort qui doit le rejoindre au cocktail au rez-de-chaussée.
Nous pouvons nous attendre à ce que la cible se déplace, donc vous devrez la trouver et improviser sur place.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_DARK_AND_STORMY_DESC:
Bonjour, 47.
Votre cible est le réalisateur de documentaires Phillipos Kaphanopolis. Il enquête autour des rumeurs selon lesquelles Dino Bosco aurait été assassiné et il croit que le studio de production en était le commanditaire. L'ICA a confirmé que la fuite ne venait pas de notre côté, et que votre travail, comme toujours, était parfait.
Vous retournerez à Sapienza pour éliminer la cible avant qu'elle n'attire plus d'attention sur le sujet.
Nous pensons qu'il sera accompagné de son producteur Craig Black et d'un caméraman. Sapienza accueille son festival annuel et nous nous attendons à ce que la sécurité soit plus importante que d'habitude.
Vous n'avez pas une minute à perdre, 47. Bonne chance.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_MINT_JULEP_DESC:
Bonjour, 47.
Votre cible est le député Anthony L. Troutt, un vétéran de l'invasion de la Grenade en 1983. Différents rapports l'impliquant dans des incidents de tir ami ont été étouffés après le conflit et ne sont jamais devenus publics.
Il est hébergé par Silvio Caruso à Sapienza, dans le cadre d'une rencontre avec des financiers et hommes d'affaire européens en amont d'une possible candidature présidentielle en 2024. Attendez-vous à ce qu'une sécurité renforcée et au moins un assistant personnel soient à proximité de la cible à toute heure.
Vous n'avez pas une minute à perdre, 47. Bonne chance.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_CAIPIRINHA_DESC:
Bonjour, 47.
Votre cible est la personnalité médiatique Bartholomew Argus. Le charismatique musicien-devenu-star de cinéma est au centre d'une enquête de trafic de drogues et d'armes au Royaume-Uni et est l'objet d'un mandat d'arrêt venant d'Interpol. La cible a disparu de la circulation, laissant son ancien partenaire Tommy Stoakes dit "Hammer", célèbre gangster londonien, porter le chapeau.
Nous avons appris que la cible se cachait à Sapienza où il est invité par Dino Bosco. C'est donc l'occasion idéale de frapper.
Vous n'avez pas une minute à perdre, 47. Bonne chance.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_BLOODYMARY_DESC:
Bonjour, 47.
Votre cible est Adeze Oijofor, également connue sous son nom de guerre Nne Obara, ou "Bloody Mamma". Elle dirige des groupes de militiens et de bandits à travers l'Afrique de l'ouest et gère une partie importante des échanges de terres rares venant de cette région. À la suite de l'intervention française sur cette partie du continent, elle cherche à protéger son héritage en rapprochant son fils de Richard Ekwensi.
Elle est actuellement au Praya Cosmopolitane, où son entourage occupe un étage entier pendant qu'elle attend l'arrivée de Ekwensi.
Vous n'avez pas une minute à perdre, 47. Bonne chance.
fr.UI_CONTRACT_THELASTWORD_OBJ_1_TITLE: Volez le PDA contenant le manuscrit inachevé
fr.UI_CONTRACT_TAMAGOZAKE_OBJ_1_TITLE: Éliminez les adeptes de Oybek Nabazov
fr.UI_CONTRACT_TAMAGOZAKE_OBJ_1_DESC: Le client demande que vous éliminiez les trois hommes de main d'Oybek Nabazov. Il précise que ces individus sont préparés pour une attaque imminente. Ils sont complètement endoctrinés et constamment aux côtés de la cible. Il devrait être assez facile de tous les éliminer, en partant du principe que les dommages collatéraux peuvent être évités.
